reviews.review: I have been playing this game for years, and it never fails to disappoint me.
Кс, хорошая игра, идёшь и пиздишь всех и вся.
Fun game, In have spent many hours on CSGO. Silver Gang
show de bola melhor game de fps
I liked this game because there most of the players are friendly and can support you and your team. Thanks to the developers for such a cool game!

Kiedyś dałem dobrą opinię, ale..... 
Cs w aktualnym momencie cs jest niegrywalny. Mam 80 gier na steam, prime już dawno, konto od 5 lat więc według ich systemu powinienem mieć wysoki czynnik zaufania. No tylko że to jest kolejna rzecz która nie działa. Ranga mge. 
Co 2 mecz trafiam na gościa który nawet nie kryje się z cheatami, wygraliśmy 5 rund pod rząd typ się wkurzył i koniec po meczu nie ma sensu go nawet grać. 
Mam na dzieję że może za 10 lat vac zacznie działać, bo w aktualnym momencie jest po prostu śmieszny.
This game is perfect if you want to know how many Polish kids f*ucked your mother......

Good game.

This is definitely replayable when you're not bad.

But also we need more maps to play and the pro's match could be more interesting on New maps.
отличная игра, минимальные требования для игры

Я выложил обзор этой игры на русском языке, потому что там больше цикаблят, чем привилегированного жанра white cis, я просто выложил этот обзор для успеха продаж Steam 2019, дерьмо всем, кто читает и получит удовольствие от перевода.
I love the mechanics of this game!
Faz vc passar raiva. Ficar puto mas amo. 2k de hrs bem vividas

im just making this review for the steam sale.

Карача, валв - хуйня, Илюх выеби этот валв  (добавьте ебаный хоть и мизерный античит блять, заебало из всех 200+ репортов не забанило никого блять, а если ебаные сервера и ебучий античит настраивать не умеете, то идите нахуй).

my children were taken because of this game, they were good strong Isreali boys, i trained them for many moons and now they are gone, i have been fooled, deceived, mislead, hoodwinked, bluffed and many other synonyms of fooled. those no good ISIS people had busted down my door as i had THRASHED their middle eastern bretherin. This kidnapping would not  have happened if this demon of a game did not tempt me. I should have known better as my gamer skill far exceeds the lowly steam scum, I should have known that my skill would have angered other jealous gamers.
Muy buen juego, solo que las partidas están llenas de hackers cuando no tienes prime.
alot of hackers but it is fun
It's alright. Just ignore everything wrong with it and it's fine
